description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Summary receivable from client daily: Bank/ Cash
              
              - Daily reconcile bank and cash of incoming payment
              
              - Issue VAT invoice to clients
              
              - Prepare monthly aging receivable report, generate age analysis
              
              - Ensure prompt clearing of all collections of accounts documentation and invoice
              
              according to regulations;
              
              - Ensure quality of accounts receivable reporting;
              
              - Minimize unidentified/unallocated receipts and goods issued-but-not-billed.
              
              - Reconciliation of accounts
              
              - Daily control and check revenue in system
              
              - Monthly analyze revenue report
              
              - Research and solve payment discrepancies
              
              - Follow established procedures for processing receipts, cash etc.
              
              - Investigate and resolve customer queries in relation with wrong collection and invoice
              
              - Process adjustments
              
              - Protects organization's value by keeping information confidential.
              
              - Other duties are assigned by Chief Accountant.
              
              - Audit support for Credit & Collections
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              * Requirements:
              
              - B.A Degree in Accounting
              
              - At least 2 years working experience in AR with e-commerce business is advantage
              
              - Understanding credit card payment is advantage
              
              - Understanding of applicable computer systems, function-specific software such as Oracle,
              
              ERP, SAP
              
               Good organization and attention to detail skills
              
               Proficient in English
              
              Age: Under 30
